attributes.action: Strip the RMT of its ability to hold Londoners to ransom by constantly taking strike action on the London Underground
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Rail, Maritime and Transport (RMT) Union has called its members out for 48 hours from 18:59 on Tuesday 9 June to 18:58 on Thursday 11 June. The London Tube network will once again be brought to a standstill thanks to the grasping and out of touch RMT leadership.
